metadata.name: We Will Live Together
metadata.description:
The Original Carpet Dimensions: 

100 cm (length) * 60 cm (width)
39’ 3” in (length) * 23’ 6” in (width)
.
When I had 20 years old, I started to learn carpet weaving, at that time, it was pretty unusual because of the social chaos we had been through, but I found this art as a peaceful and calm realm for myself to be surrounded by! 

This carpet which is my very first creation, has a unique value to me, and I tried my best to tuck it away through all these 40 years! Maybe because I weaved it just during the revolution. I would love to call this piece of art probably a symbol of humanism and love that may last forever.

The most crucial point is that, if anyone would like to collect this piece of art, I would pleasurably send The Original Carpet to the dear owner to show my respect and gratitude for this act of kindness.

May anyone live in peace and love.

2022, February 20
